name: metric-rois-to-border
author: Connectome Workbench Developers
description:
Draw borders around metric rois.

For each ROI column, finds all edges on the mesh that cross the boundary of the ROI, and draws borders through them.  By default, this is done on all columns in the input file, using the map name as the name for the border.

inputs.name: surface
inputs.description: the surface to use for neighbor information

inputs.name: class_name
inputs.description: the name to use for the class of the output borders

inputs.name: opt_placement_fraction
inputs.description: set how far along the edge border points are drawn: fraction along edge from inside vertex (default 0.33)

inputs.name: opt_column_column
inputs.description: select a single column: the column number or name
